title: ui flickering
body: So i had this problem were my game would lag right before i die when in reality i could of done something like heal/ barrier etra. I looked up how to fix this and one of the results said to reset your graphics card. Resetting it i found that my game went from a constant 80 fps to 54~60 spiking down to 20 every second all the while my ui flickering to the point after playing one game my head hurts like a coconut in a mighty python short.  pls help

replies.body: turned on vertual since and it fixed everything mb.
Sounds like v-sync helped out, sweetness! Might be good to have this fix in your pocket if that starts happening again.
